annotation.value: \Abst{Exact and approximate based on normal approximation and statistical linearization, algorithms for distibutions with invariant measure analytical modeling in nongaussian stochastic systems (StS) with discontinious characteristics are developed. Peculiarities in Poisson StS are considered. Test examples confirms the practical accuracy of algorithms.}

text.value: \KW{analytical modeling; autocorrelated noise; distribution with invariant measure; method of normal approximation; method of statistical linearization; Poisson stochastic system; Pugachev integrodifferential equations, stochastic regime; stochastic system in Ito sense}
ANALYTICAL MODELING INVARIANT MEASURE DISTRIBUTIONS IN STOCHASTIC SYSTEMS WITH DISCONTINIOUS CHARACTERISTICS I.
